# Multiple Comparison Correction
```{r}
labs <- c("ADHD", "AUT", "BPD", "DEP", "SZ")
p <- c(ADHD, AUT, BPD, DEP, SZ)

bon <- (p.adjust(p, method = "bonferroni"))
names(bon) <- labs

bh <- (p.adjust(p, method = "BH"))
names(bh) <- labs

cbind(round(p,3),round(bh,3), round(bon,3))
cbind(p, bh, bon)
```
